content.body: Do we have an in-person sign-up form or location information for the May (Igalia/A Coruña) meeting yet? I would like to book travel soon to avoid higher fares. /cc @usharma:igalia.com
content.formatted_body: Do we have an in-person sign-up form or location information for the May (Igalia/A Coruña) meeting yet? I would like to book travel soon to avoid higher fares. /cc @ryzokuken

content.body: We do, let me publish something on the reflector soon.
* We do but it was a bit WIP around some details, let me publish something on the reflector soon.

m.new_content.body: We do but it was a bit WIP around some details, let me publish something on the reflector soon.

content.body: The things I need most urgently are just the address of the meeting and some hotel recommendations.

We don't have "toward 0/+∞/-∞", but we do have [truncate](https://tc39.es/ecma262/multipage/notational-conventions.html#eqn-truncate), which I would prefer:
1. Let _root_ be the square/cube root of ℝ(_n_).
2. Return ℤ(truncate(_root_)).
content.formatted_body:
We don't have "toward 0/+∞/-∞", but we do have truncate, which I would prefer:

  1. Let root be the square/cube root of ℝ(n).
  2. Return ℤ(truncate(root)).
